website_summaries.verdict: A notions kit that is essential for any serious knitter.
pros: Nice little kit that fits easily inside your sewing bag
Keeps your notions organized and handy
Box stays closed in your bag
Lots of items, including a tape measure
cons: The quality could be better both on the notions and the box they come in, but it is a nice little kit at a fair price

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Travel Kit!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little kits for my knitting travel bags and this one had a lot in it that is of great use for knitting. When I opened it, everything was tossed around in the box, but really for all there is in it, that isn't such a big deal. I like those types of scissors in my kit and it also comes with a small crochet type hook that is very useful in fixing mistakes and finishing off the project.
customer_reviews.author: JSquare

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t look like the picture at all
customer_reviews.text: See how organized it looks? Comes all jumbled up. No separate little compartments. Bought as a gift now I am thinking of returning it. Nothing like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Received, but.... ugh!
customer_reviews.text: I like the individual pieces but disappointed. The way it was advertised you'd think the container was compartmentalized but its just a hash of jumbled items. Not really convenient for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Gwilos TnT

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED BUSTED
customer_reviews.text: Half the reason I picked this set of knitting thingeys was for the plastic box. How handy, I thought, to tuck in my knitting bag. Wrong. The box arrived busted up, which made me feel like a schmuck for buying the thing. I've got the stuff in a ziplock bag, which is obviously not as compact.
customer_reviews.author: Pegasus

customer_reviews.title: The container is like really cheap thin plastic
customer_reviews.text: The container is like really cheap thin plastic. I will replace that with one from Michael's store. I made my own for crocheting so I needed one for knitting. This is a good starter accessory kit. I do like the items in the kit. I took the bulb safety pins and put them in with the circle markers and that keeps those circles from falling around inside the container.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Great, useful knitting extras
customer_reviews.text: I needed this kit to have odds and ends on hand when I actually need them. Everything is absolutely useful and in its case, very transportable to just throw in my knitting bag to have with me all the time!
customer_reviews.author: fl deb

customer_reviews.title: Great plastic materials for beginner tools
customer_reviews.text: These are made of plastic from China, great for value of money spent. The clippers, place rings all do their jobs. I only mentioned the plastic because the professionals seem prefer metal tools.
customer_reviews.author: A. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: exactly what's in the picture
customer_reviews.text: some reviews said their product arrived disorganized and not like the photo, but I guess either I got the proper version or they've corrected the product since then. The cheap plastic has sharp parts sticking out here and there, but I just sanded those parts down with a nail file and I'm all good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Park

customer_reviews.title: great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This was such an inexpensive great find. It could break if your not careful with it most pieces are plastic, but some are metal. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MINA

customer_reviews.title: Nice Accessory to Have
customer_reviews.text: This actually had more things than I needed, so I'm very pleased with the product. Most of the items are durable. I've used several pieces already.
customer_reviews.author: Donna DM Yates

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginner or travel set.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: small, great variety, useful items Con: , not as pictured, everything is all jumbled up together
customer_reviews.author: Pat S.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Still learning how to use some of the tools. Bit out of my purview, but that's were Mama comes in to the picture. Items have lasted over a year, so happy child equals good investment. Still waiting on my scarf.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Compact, convenient knitting tools
customer_reviews.text: This compact little kit contains most of the useful items you need in a basic knitting accessory kit-- and the plastic storage case, while not impressively sturdy, is holding up well so far as it rattles around in my knitting bag, and stays closed. It's nice to have anything I need close at hand, at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: The thread cutter is greasy and rough along the outside ...
customer_reviews.text: The thread cutter is greasy and rough along the outside metal edge. I suppose the grease is to retard rust.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Haldeman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I needed cable needles and markers. What a great value to get both (plus other useful stuff) in one neat box, much more economical than getting them separately. Great selection of sizes of markers.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: All what you need for crochet work in a good price.
customer_reviews.text: All what you need of crochet accessories in a good price.
customer_reviews.author: amany

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit has almost everything needed to a knitter. All you need is the yarn and a pattern!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Patty

customer_reviews.title: Everything seen is there but jumbled together
customer_reviews.text: It has everything I need as a beginner, but it was all jumbled together which looked very confusing in the beginning. I sorted it all out and it came with everything advertised. I like the little box as it gives me somewhere to put everything I have recently started collecting for knitting.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Medina

customer_reviews.title: Little box with lots of gadgets
customer_reviews.text: Has a wee bit of everything needed for knitting. Using it as I write. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: SunnySue

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The items in the kit are not high quality but I like the container to keep supplies in and I love the little nippers that came in it and the tape measure.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lacey

customer_reviews.title: The yarn snipper is of very poor quality and the clips broke the first time they ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is an okay selection. The most valuable parts are the plastic needles. The yarn snipper is of very poor quality and the clips broke the first time they were used.
customer_reviews.author: Eames

customer_reviews.title: Great product for beginners or experienced
customer_reviews.text: Great size and useful components for beginner or experienced stitchers.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was useless. Not worth the money spent. Open the box and the smell is toxic would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: All yarn supplies you will need
customer_reviews.text: The product was very useful and the container keeps everything together , easy to find and organize. Money well spent !
customer_reviews.author: maryjo

customer_reviews.title: Handy accessory
customer_reviews.text: Very handy kit! Has almost everything I need for knitting/crocheting. Size is perfect - not too small and not too large.
customer_reviews.author: N. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set
customer_reviews.text: The perfect set of knitters tools. A great addition to any knitting bag.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Kroy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute little took kit lots of items in the kit
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A

customer_reviews.title: Compact, well-equipped
customer_reviews.text: Everything I need in one place. Tape measure is correctly calibrated.
customer_reviews.author: DellaC

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I'm somewhat new to knitting, and I didn't want to spend tons of money getting each of these items individually. This was exactly what I needed at a low price! It contained some items that I didn't know I even needed that have turned out to be very useful. Quality is great for the price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure everything came (I didn't count everything), but it didn't come organized at in the box at all. Still has what I need and for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lane

customer_reviews.title: I love everything included
customer_reviews.text: I love everything included. The case doesn't keep each item contained so the stitch markers are all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mangini

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Has everything it said it would. Only complaint is the box is a little hard to open, but can easily be fixed
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The scissors are dull. Not the highest quality, but alright for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel size knitting accessory kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this little kit everything you need accessory wise for knitting. Will be ordering again thank you!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M. Wordlaw

customer_reviews.title: Very upset
customer_reviews.text: Very up set the scissor don't cut thought my yarn and the clips that look like chip bag clips broke already 2 of my open circle counter broke already have not used the rest but so far very upset also spent the $13 on it hoping to get the colors that the photo showes and did not it did not say in assorted colors when I order it
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great value and it holds extra things you use in your crafts!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat little case to have around..... I'm using this for crochet also....
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: nice little kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, but they said that they really liked it. I think that the top could have fit just a little more snug.
customer_reviews.author: Leah200363

customer_reviews.title: Knitting accessories not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The product was much smaller than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travelling - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an upcoming business trip that I plan to spend knitting in every second of my down-time. This set is perfect, contains everything that I otherwise would be likely to forget about and/or misplace. It would make a great gift for a beginner knitter, as to purchase all of these items separately from a craft store would cost and arm and a leg. The handy case that it comes in is small enough to fit tidily in my bag, but big enough to hold everything I need. It was delivered promptly and was nicely packaged. Very happy with this product and this vendor. I will go back to them for future knitting needs. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Must Love Pugs

customer_reviews.title: Good, but some defective tape
customer_reviews.text: This kit is sufficient for a novice knitter like myself. The kit is filled with helpful tapestry needles, markers, and cable needles, but the measuring tape is barely holding itself together (likely got too hot during the manufacturing process, it looks like stretched out string cheese!).
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Already paid for itself in all the mistakes I've been able to fix!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! OMG, it has everything, and I've used it SO MUCH to fix my mistakes. All the items were tossed around, loose in the kit, so I separated all the rings, etc., and put them into tiny (jewelry finding size) ziplock bags, so it's neater. I also love the size, as it fits into my knitting bag.
customer_reviews.author: PZFGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Really works well. I put off buying this initially thinking I should only buy each item I need as I need it. Eventually realized I need most things in the kit and would have saved money buying this first. Overall works well. Great price for what you get. Only missing yarn needle.
customer_reviews.author: Tikki MarsTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: Best little tool kit ever for knitters
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over the summer as a Christmas gift but ended up giving it to my sister several months early, she loves it. It is small but conveniently contains notions that are a must for knitters. Well worth the price. I highly recommend purchasing this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Everything I need
customer_reviews.text: I'm a longtime knitter, but recently lost my cache of knitting accessories I'd gotten over years. This is a wonderful replacement, it has everything I need for a ton of different projects.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay P

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit, very compact.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mother, she is over the moon happy. I don't have the knitting talent so if my mother says is good I will just believe.
customer_reviews.author: Judy W

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a beginner and doesn’t cost a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Not as it appears.
customer_reviews.text: It does not have compartments like one of the answers to the questions or the picture makes it look like! I thought it would be a nice little organizer. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna F. Deck

customer_reviews.title: Accessories !!
customer_reviews.text: The knitting accessories kit was just what I needed. It has everything a person might need for his or her project !
customer_reviews.author: Betty Boop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A LITTLE OF EVERYTHING FOR MY PROJECTS - ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.author: Helen McKenna

customer_reviews.title: I'm finding uses for all of these and the container is nice too. Perfect little kit of notions for anyone ...
customer_reviews.text: This has everything you need for knitting, and would work for crochet as well. I'm finding uses for all of these and the container is nice too. Perfect little kit of notions for anyone who enjoys knitting and crochet.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for beginning knitters
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year old niece is a knitting novice and loved this gift set. She says she doesn't know how half the pieces will be used, but loves the colors and is excited to learn about them.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Just the stuff you need and not a bunch of stuff you don't need
customer_reviews.text: Cute little set of things you can really use when working with yarn (I like to crochet). The snippers are really sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Curtis

customer_reviews.title: A little of everything!
customer_reviews.text: Has a few of all the things I need to help my knitting projects.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Weber

customer_reviews.title: One stop shopping!
customer_reviews.text: my knitting friend loved all the little gagets that are a must have for any knitter!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this package kit. Has everything I need for knitting. Great for a beginner!!
customer_reviews.author: QuiltingJenny

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful multi-purpose kit
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day! What a wonderful multi-purpose kit!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety of useful items. I am very glad I purchased this set.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mix of everything and in a handy case to keep organized!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Eisenga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little accessory kit
customer_reviews.text: everything I need when I knit or crochet in one little kit.
customer_reviews.author: Anice G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love having the different tools I need all in one place.
customer_reviews.author: MzCher

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Cute little kit that has everything I needed for knitting.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: It has everything I couldn't find in my local store.
customer_reviews.author: amarquez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition for my daughters knitting accessories. Not the best quality but serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Knitting Accessories Knitting Kit Knitting Supplies Knitting Tools Cable Needles for Knitting Kits
product_meta.description:
WHAT'S IN THE KIT 
1pcs Container (7''x4") 
1pcs Thread Cutter (4.75"x0.75") 
1pcs Tape Measurer (60'') 
1pcs Plastic Sewing Needle (3.5'') 
1pcs Large-Eye Yarn Needle (2.25'') 
1pcs Modification Crochet Needle (3'') 
1pcs Double Ended Crochet Hook (6.75'') 
2pcs Clips (1.25"x0.75") 
2pcs Aluminium Stitch Holders (4.75") 
3pcs Plastic Cable Needles (3.75", 4", 4.25") 
4pcs Needle Tip Protectors Small 
4pcs Needle Tip Protectors Large 
5pcs Split Stitch Markers Small 
5pcs Split Stitch Markers Large 
8pcs Ring Markers Small 
8pcs Ring Markers Medium 
8pcs Ring Markers Large 
16pcs Locking Stitch Markers
feature_bullets: Beginner Knitting Kit - The container latch is sturdy and keeps closed in your bag. Don't need to worry about the mess if the case is open.
Crochet Accessories - Tape measure is correctly calibrated.
Knitting Starter Kit - The yarn cutter comes with a safety cap. Much safter to storage it with so many notions.

The Knitting Tools Kit is A Great Addition to Any Knitting Bag - It is small but conveniently contains notions that are a must for knitters. This compact little kit contains most of the useful items you need in a basic knitting accessory kit.

The variety of marker and ring colors allows you to categorize stitches when knitting fair isle and to mark reminders easily. The different sizes also let you choose markers/rings that are more suitable for a certain needle size or weight of yarn. All the markers and needles are sturdy and easy to use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars199 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
